headerDisplay:
TP-Link Smart Home Plugin.

Most users do not require configuration and can just click "Save" to get started. See [README](https://github.com/plasticrake/homebridge-tplink-smarthome/blob/master/README.md) for more information.

minTemperatureThreshold.title: Minimum Temperature Threshold
minTemperatureThreshold.description: Threshold that fires the detector at and under this value

maxTemperatureThreshold.title: Maximum Temperature Threshold
maxTemperatureThreshold.description: Threshold that fires the detector at and over this value

openWeatherMapApiKey.title: API key of your OpenWeatherMap.org account
openWeatherMapApiKey.description: API key can be get at https://home.openweathermap.org/users/sign_up

updateInterval.title: Interval between each temperature updates (sec)
updateInterval.description: Do not update too often to make sure that you dont over use your subscription
